item.title: Application Deployment Checklist
item.description: Your app is built and you need to deploy it. What Next? Read On... Before we deploy applications we need to follow a set of process to ensure our application stack is prepared for any expected or unexpected events. Over the years I have experienced these scenarios and I have created a set of my personal checklists which allow me to quickly check that my application has all the requirements for recovering from potential pitfalls.
